sentences.sContent: There was NO vulgar bullying, NO bravado of any sort, NO choleric hectoring…
sentences.sContent_eng: There was NO vulgar bullying, NO bravado of any sort, NO choleric hectoring…
sentences.sCn: 没有低级庸俗的恃强欺弱，没有任何形式的虚张声势，没有怒气冲冲的威胁恐吓…

synos.tran: 易怒的；暴躁的；胆汁质的

remMethod.val: choler (胆汁) + ic → 胆汁质的 → 易怒的； choler本身是一个单词， 意为“暴怒”
